name: UNUserNotificationCenterDelegate
desc: The interface for handling incoming notifications and notification-related actions.

items.name: func userNotificationCenter(UNUserNotificationCenter, didReceive: UNNotificationResponse, withCompletionHandler: () -> Void)
items.desc: Asks the delegate to process the user's response to a delivered notification.

items.name: func userNotificationCenter(UNUserNotificationCenter, willPresent: UNNotification, withCompletionHandler: (UNNotificationPresentationOptions) -> Void)
items.desc: Asks the delegate how to handle a notification that arrived while the app was running in the foreground.

items.name: struct UNNotificationPresentationOptions
items.desc: Constants indicating how to present a notification in a foreground app.

items.name: func userNotificationCenter(UNUserNotificationCenter, openSettingsFor: UNNotification?)
items.desc: Asks the delegate to display the in-app notification settings.
